articles.title: Musk says he plans to sue Apple for not featuring X or Grok among its top apps
articles.summary: Billionaire SpaceX, Tesla and X owner Elon Musk says he plans to sue Apple for not featuring X and its Grok artificial intelligence chatbot app in its top recommended apps in its App Store.
articles.translated_title: Musk says he plans to sue Apple for not featuring X or Grok among its top apps
articles.translated_summary: Billionaire SpaceX, Tesla and X owner Elon Musk says he plans to sue Apple for not featuring X and its Grok artificial intelligence chatbot app in its top recommended apps in its App Store.

articles.title: Companies Are Pouring Billions Into A.I. It Has Yet to Pay Off.
articles.summary: Corporate spending on artificial intelligence is surging as executives bank on major efficiency gains. So far, they report little effect to the bottom line.
articles.translated_title: Companies Are Pouring Billions Into A.I. It Has Yet to Pay Off.
articles.translated_summary: Corporate spending on artificial intelligence is surging as executives bank on major efficiency gains. So far, they report little effect to the bottom line.

articles.title: AI Chipmaker Iluvatar CoreX Is Said to Mull Hong Kong IPO
articles.summary: Iluvatar CoreX is considering an initial public offering in Hong Kong, as investor interest in Chinese artificial intelligence chipmakers builds with Beijing discouraging local firms from using Nvidia Corp. processors.
articles.translated_title: AI Chipmaker Iluvatar CoreX Is Said to Mull Hong Kong IPO
articles.translated_summary: Iluvatar CoreX is considering an initial public offering in Hong Kong, as investor interest in Chinese artificial intelligence chipmakers builds with Beijing discouraging local firms from using Nvidia Corp. processors.

articles.title: Presight CEO: AI Era is Here to Stay
articles.summary: Presight has reported record 1H growth as revenue surpassed AED 1 billion. The Abu Dhabi based AI company also said 2Q revenue and net profit rose, fueled by its acquisition of AIQ, a firm specializing in artificial intelligence solutions for the energy industry. Presight CEO, Thomas Pramotedham spoke to Bloomberg's Lizzy Burden on Horizons Middle East and Africa on their international acquisitions as well as use of AI in oilfields. (Source: Bloomberg)

articles.title: Short Wave : NPR
articles.summary: Neurotic, anxious robots like C-3P0 from Star Wars' C-3P0 and Marvin from The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy are a staple of science fiction ‚Äî but they're not as common in the real world. Most of the time, the chatbots and artificial intelligence "robots" we encounter are programmed to be extraverted, confident and cheerful. But what if that changed?NPR science correspondent Nell Greenfieldboyce dives into the world of robot personality research and talks to a team of researchers that are experimenting with a very different kind of robot temperament.Read more of Nell's reporting on the topic here.Interested in more science news? Let us know at shortwave@npr.org.¬†Listen to every episode of Short Wave sponsor-free and support our work at NPR by signing up for Short Wave+ at¬†plus.npr.org/shortwave.Love podcasts? For handpicked recommendations every Friday, subscribe to NPR's Pod Club.

articles.title: Microsoft Lures Meta's Talent Pool With Multimillion-Dollar Pay Packages As The AI War Heats Up: Report
articles.summary: Microsoft is aggressively targeting top AI talent from Meta by offering multimillion-dollar bonuses amid a $240 billion industry-wide surge in AI spending, intensifying the battle for supremacy in artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: Microsoft Lures Meta's Talent Pool With Multimillion-Dollar Pay Packages As The AI War Heats Up: Report
articles.translated_summary: Microsoft is aggressively targeting top AI talent from Meta by offering multimillion-dollar bonuses amid a $240 billion industry-wide surge in AI spending, intensifying the battle for supremacy in artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Taiwan‚Äôs Stock Index Rises to Near Record High Amid AI Optimism
articles.summary: Taiwanese shares neared a record high, buoyed by a strong outlook for artificial intelligence and exemption from some US tariffs for major chip makers.
articles.translated_title: Taiwan‚Äôs Stock Index Rises to Near Record High Amid AI Optimism

articles.title: How to beat AI-driven custom pricing
articles.summary: There are new concerns around how artificial intelligence might be used to set prices for products, such as airfare. It comes after Delta Airlines announced it was using AI to help adjust prices on some of its flights. Tim McPhillips takes a look at how to approach buying tickets and how all consumers can help guard themselves against AI-driven custom pricing.

articles.title: Meta and Mark Zuckerberg tap MAGA influencer as AI ‚Äòbias‚Äô adviser
articles.summary: Meta has brought on right-wing influencer Robby Starbuck to join an internal board purportedly focused on rooting out bias from its artificial intelligence models.
